title: Immortal Sands
description: Taréis has been ruled by the Family for a thousand years. They have taken in all children who have lost their magic, kept them alive and comfortable for as long as possible. Under their reign, the people of Taréis have lived in peace. And the worst of their criminals, get sent to Brakktis prison at the far edge of the land.Brakktis is the last place Phenna would have expected to learn anything about the Family. But the prisoner in the next cell has some interesting secrets to share about the Family and the children they care for – one of which is Phenna’s twin sister. Now, having escaped from the toughest prison in Taréis, Phenna will not stop until she has her sister back and the Family is ruined. But as a fugitive on the run, she struggles to remain hidden and along the way she will have to face her own demons and come to terms with her past.
author: McKenzie Maughan
